mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_kai_piao set projectId=#{projectId}, projectName=#{projectName},heTongYe=#{heTongYe},unitName=#{unitName}, unitShuiHao=#{unitShuiHao},unitDiZhi=#{unitDiZhi},unitTel=#{unitTel}, unitYinHang=#{unitYinHang},unitZhangHao=#{unitZhangHao},laoWuMingCheng=#{laoWuMingCheng}, guiGeXingHao=#{guiGeXingHao},danWei=#{danWei},shuLiang=#{shuLiang},jinE=#{jinE},fuKuanType=#{fuKuanType}, fuQing=#{fuQing},faPiaoNum=#{faPiaoNum},kaiPiaoId=#{kaiPiaoId},kaiPiaoType=#{kaiPiaoType}, kaiPiaoName=#{kaiPiaoName},tongZhiId=#{tongZhiId},tongZhiName=#{tongZhiName},wenJianUrl=#{wenJianUrl}, financeBiLi=#{financeBiLi},financeJinE=#{financeJinE},finalBaoJia=#{finalBaoJia},needKaiPiao=#{needKaiPiao}, auditJson=#{auditJson},ziLiaoType=#{ziLiaoType},xinXiUrl=#{xinXiUrl},daoKuanTime=#{daoKuanTime},daoKuan=#{daoKuan}, addUserId=#{addUserId},addUserName=#{addUserName},status=0,remark=#{remark},updateTime=now(), createTime=now(),isDeleted=FALSE
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM work_kai_piao WHERE isDeleted=FALSE AND addUserId=#{userId} AND
status <=-1
status >=1
status = 0
ORDER BY id DESC
